description:
The students find the waste tower is equally full of mysteries and danger. Alice confronts Renfred once more, and Seth and Lucy try to reconcile their past. Lizbeth`s message to the College is met with a cold response from Principal Quillyn.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Small Leak Will Sink a Great Ship. II
